body.p: One way to think about epitopes and antigens is to think about the all the apps that are available for a smart phone. A brand new B or T cell encounters antigen it has never seen before. The cell uses the scanner function on the smart phone to analyze the complex antigen molecule. The smart phone checks with the and sees that it has an app to react with one part of the antigen molecule the . If indeed it does have an app for that it will react to the antigen molecule and provide an immune response. An individual T or B cell will only function against a single but that may be found on similar providing some cross coverage.
